entry.title: blobworld 1.1-2 has been released
entry.content:
• config file added
  • sound and keys added
  • Various other improvements
entry.summary: config file added sound and keys added Various other improvements

entry.title: Cylon 5.0-1 has been released
entry.content:
• Two new package lists added to package list generator.
  • New optional environment variable to allow for no colour “CYLON_COLOR_OFF”.
  • System information display optimisations.
  • New system maintenance option added “List All Open Files”, htop removed as dependency.
  • Option to backup GPT partition added in addition to MBR. also rsync option optimised.
  • New command line option added “notify -n” to enable desktop notifications.
  • Cylon
entry.summary: Two new package lists added to package list generator. New optional environment variable to allow for no colour “CYLON_COLOR_OFF”. System information display optimisations. New system maintenance option added “List All Open Files”, htop removed as dependency. Option to backup GPT partition added in addition to MBR. also rsync option optimised. New command line option added “notify -n” to enable desktop notifications. Cylon

entry.title: rpi_tempmon 1.4-5 has been released
entry.content:
• Code rewritten complete in python3 (from a mixture of bash and python)
  • Graph of realtime CPU data added

Rpi temperature monitor
entry.summary: Code rewritten complete in python3 (from a mixture of bash and python) Graph of realtime CPU data added

entry.title: fmo 1.1 : Pull request merged
entry.content:
• craftguy merged 1 commit into craftyguy:master from gavinlyonsrepo:removeflag on Jul 16
  • fmo
entry.summary: craftguy merged 1 commit into craftyguy:master from gavinlyonsrepo:removeflag on Jul 16 fmo

entry.title: Cylon 4.2-3 has been released
entry.content:
• Package list expanded from 10 to 20 items
  • Extra information added to system display.
  • Pull request by “uros-stegic” to fix typo on system display page added
  • Dependency array code optimisation to HelpFunc instead of long list
  • prompt and information display for orphan delete option added
  • CowerFunc new option to search AUR packages by orphan maintainer.
  • Ascii art placed in function AsciiArtFunc.
entry.summary: Package list expanded from 10 to 20 items Extra information added to system display. Pull request by “uros-stegic” to fix typo on system display page added Dependency array code optimisation to HelpFunc instead of long list prompt and information display for orphan delete option added CowerFunc new option to search AUR packages by orphan maintainer. Ascii art placed in function AsciiArtFunc.

entry.title: Cylon 4.1-2 has been released
entry.content:
• Now using $EDITOR variable to pick text editor
  • Loop the bleachbit options menu -b for user convenance.
  • New Clamavscan options and configfile setting.
  • Two new maintenance options, find inodes usage and find biggest files
  • Ascii art added
  • 3 new pacman option added(view log, optimise and paccache -ruk0)
  • Auditing SUID/SGID Files added to security + chage -l option
  • Various new network options added.
entry.summary: Now using $EDITOR variable to pick text editor Loop the bleachbit options menu -b for user convenance. New Clamavscan options and configfile setting. Two new maintenance options, find inodes usage and find biggest files Ascii art added 3 new pacman option added(view log, optimise and paccache -ruk0) Auditing SUID/SGID Files added to security + chage -l option Various new network options added.

entry.title: Arduino_clock_2 1.0 created
entry.content:
• Name : clock_number_2
  • Title : Arduino Real Time Alarm Clock with Temperature and LED lights. Remote controlled
  • Description : Arduino Clock with Battery backup (real time clock), Time, Date, Alarm, Temperature, LCD output, remote control input, Sleep mode, LED lighting (10X) with 10 light modes
  • Author: Gavin Lyons

Clock
entry.summary: Name : clock_number_2 Title : Arduino Real Time Alarm Clock with Temperature and LED lights. Remote controlled Description : Arduino Clock with Battery backup (real time clock), Time, Date, Alarm, Temperature, LCD output, remote control input, Sleep mode, LED lighting (10X) with 10 light modes Author: Gavin Lyons

entry.title: Arduino_clock_1 1.0 created
entry.content:
• Name : clock_number_1
  • Title : Arduino Real Time Clock with Alarm and environmental sensors
  • Description : Arduino Clock , with , Battery backup (real time clock), Time, Date, Alarm, Temperature, Humidity, Pressure, LCD output, Keypad input, Sleep mode, LED LCD lighting (4X) white with dimmer control

entry.title: Arduino_FM_radio 1.0 created
entry.content:
• Name : Arduino Fm-radio
  • Title : Fm-radio and speaker
  • Description : Arduino Fm radio module using TEA5767 fm module, LM386 module Audio AMP with KA2284 audio level indicator and 0.96” SSD1306 I2C OLED LCD Display Module. The unit can be used as a radio or speaker. by placing removebale audio cable between output of TEA5767 and inoput of LM386 Audio AMP.

Radio
entry.summary: Name : Arduino Fm-radio Title : Fm-radio and speaker Description : Arduino Fm radio module using TEA5767 fm module, LM386 module Audio AMP with KA2284 audio level indicator and 0.96” SSD1306 I2C OLED LCD Display Module. The unit can be used as a radio or speaker. by placing removebale audio cable between output of TEA5767 and inoput of LM386 Audio AMP.

entry.title: particle_fire_simulation created
entry.content:
• Name: particle_fire_simulation
  • Title: particle fire simulation
  • Description: particle fire simulation C++ graphics program. The program creates a SDL API driven graphic display in a window.
